body_html: In local tests and CI test, this new mechanism detected MaxUnpool3d (test_nn.TestNN.test_MaxUnpool3d_net_cuda) and MultiLabelMarginCriterion (test_legacy_nn.TestNN.test_MultiLabelMarginCriterion_1d_cuda) leaking memory.
body_text: In local tests and CI test, this new mechanism detected MaxUnpool3d (test_nn.TestNN.test_MaxUnpool3d_net_cuda) and MultiLabelMarginCriterion (test_legacy_nn.TestNN.test_MultiLabelMarginCriterion_1d_cuda) leaking memory.
body: In local tests and CI test, this new mechanism detected `MaxUnpool3d` (`test_nn.TestNN.test_MaxUnpool3d_net_cuda`) and `MultiLabelMarginCriterion` (`test_legacy_nn.TestNN.test_MultiLabelMarginCriterion_1d_cuda`) leaking memory.
